mapper.insert: insert into t_trade (userId, taskId, tradeNo, subject, amount, balance, totalAmount, addTime, payType, payState, payFlag) values (#{userId}, #{taskId}, #{tradeNo}, #{subject}, #{amount}, #{balance}, #{totalAmount}, #{addTime}, #{payType}, #{payState}, #{payFlag})
mapper.update: update t_trade set amount=#{amount}, balance=#{balance}, totalAmount=#{totalAmount}, addTime=#{addTime}, payType=#{payType}, payState=#{payState}, thirdNo=#{thirdNo}, thirdStatus=#{thirdStatus}, thirdBuyer=#{thirdBuyer}, payTime=#{payTime}, notifyStatus=#{notifyStatus}, notifyTime=#{notifyTime} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_trade where taskId=#{taskId} order by id desc limit 1
select tradeNo from t_trade where taskId=#{taskId} order by id desc limit 1
